name: The room of HELL
description: A level for Doom II. I have included a LMP demo that show you it's very hard, you have to move quickly or else you gonna die. In the room of the Hell there is a door on the right side of the very big boss (he's sleeping don't worry about him). Open this door and you'll find some help, not 2 but 3 Archviles are waiting in this room to protect something ...
